title: Joyce Vance: From Personal Loss to Public Service
description:
MSNBC Legal Analyst, law professor, and former U.S. Attorney Joyce Vance shares the compelling story of how the murder of her father-in-law by a serial bomber led her to a career change. Vance also speaks candidly about her role as a cable TV analyst - and offers us some "chicken coop" for the soul.

Joyce Vance
https://twitter.com/JoyceWhiteVance

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
